title: [SDMP 0.10.4](http://sdmp.github.io/) Resource Response Schema
description: Schema for an SDMP [resource response](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/synchronization/#resource-response) object. These are used by nodes to send resources to other nodes.

description.description: Human readable string to describe the response object.

status.description: If the data object is in response to a [resource request](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/synchronization/#resource-request), this property must be a valid [status code](#response-status-code), which is similar to HTTP status codes in that it indicates the status of the response.

request.description: If the data object is in response to a [resource request](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/synchronization/#resource-request), this property must be the value of the `request.identifier`.

content.description: If the object contains a valid [resource object](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/resource/), this object is the complete [SDMP container](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/container/). In all other cases, this property must not be set.
